attributes.action: accept the views of true labour supporters over those with a vested interest in him staying in office, and to step down
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the overwhelming defeat in what was a predominatly Labour seat over the last 60 years, to a 27 year old Tory new girl, We ask the P.M. to step down, in favour of somebody who has even the slightest chance of steering the party to a general election vicory. He does not have this chance, and defeat will be his fault.
